articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: NASA Tests Snake-Like Robot to Search for Life in the Solar System - VOA Learning English
articles.description: The American space agency is testing robot that moves like a snake. The goal is to explore hard-to-reach places on planets and moons.
articles.content:
The American space agency NASA is testing a snake-like explorer designed to search for signs of life in hard-to-reach places.
The robot is known as the Exobiology Extant Life Surveyor, or EELS. NASA… [+4896 chars]

articles.title: Allen & Overy and Shearman plan merger to create $3.4bn law firm - Financial Times
articles.description: Deal is first tie-up between a ‘magic circle’ group and an American rival in more than 20 years
articles.content: Magic circle law firm Allen & Overy is merging with New Yorks Shearman & Sterling to form a practice with combined revenues of about $3.4bn, in one of the biggest transatlantic legal tie-ups … [+3807 chars]

articles.title: US endangered birds include whooping crane, condor, scrub-jays: List - USA TODAY
articles.description: Condors, cranes and some scrub-jay species are among more than 100 of America's most at-risk birds for extinction.
articles.content:
If you enjoy watching cardinals or bluebirds at a feeder or seeing a great blue heron at the water's edge, it may not be immediately apparent but the nation's birds are under siege.
